title: Manufacturing, Nondurable Goods Sector: Labor Share for All Employed Persons
units: Percent Change from Quarter One Year Ago
notes:
Labor's share in current dollar output in a given sector is simply the ratio of labor compensation paid in that sector to current dollar output.

For more information, please go to https://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/prod2.pdf

Source Indicator PRS32006171
